events.text:
You have figured me out. So be it.
What happens now, dear assistant? Do you leave me in this cauldron to rust and rot? Another will come someday and they will not be as clever as you.
Will you send me back to my withered mortal coil? I do not think you have the gall to strangle a feeble old man, even in these circumstances.
If you leave me to live, I will curse you and your bloodline for generations.

*You pluck a hair from master's corpse and drop it into the cauldron, immediately dipping in the object that you selected.*
*A whispered scream wafts from the object as you hold it in your hand.*
*This is the end.*

events.question: *Kill the old hermit or spare their  life?

events.text: *Your former master shouts curses and swear words as you gather your belongings and leave the hut behind.*
